page.title: 03VISITORS IN PORTHLEVEN.
page.content: On Wednesday 3rd.July our class spent the afternoon in the village interviewing visitors to Porthleven. We asked five questions. Here are the questions and the counts we made. ARE YOU A VISITOR? 112 people said yes. WHICH COUNTRY DO YOU COME FROM? England__97;Scotland__5;Wales__3; France__1;Italy__1;Sweden__2;U.S.A.__2 South Africa__1. IF IN ENGLAND,WHERE? Visitors came from all over England, from Penzance to Lancashire, from the Midlands and the South, including London. HOW DID YOU TRAVEL TO PORTHLEVEN? By car__81; bus/coach__13; Train,to Redruth or Penzance--9; Plane__6; Boat__3. HAVE YOU BEEN HERE BEFORE? Yes__65; No__47.
